comments.body: Had to change up the scalatest syntax in some `all(...) should ...` cases to get it to keep working in 3.2.0+ ; should be equivalent
One last clarifying comment: This change slightly improves the test to _not_ ignore javascript errors, and as part of that, needed to test as a modern browser (IE 11 vs IE 8).
